org.fridlund.pacman.managers

Class GhostManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fridlund.pacman.managers.Manager
      • org.fridlund.pacman.managers.GhostManager

  • public class GhostManager
extends Manager
    Handles when the ghosts should get out of the nest, and is responsible for updating and rendering the ghosts. Also handles collision detection between ghosts and Pacman.
     

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.fridlund.pacman.managers.Manager

        game, level, pacman

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GhostManager(GameplayScene game, Pacman pacman, Level level, int numberOfGhosts)
      Creates a ghost manager that makes sure that ghosts can't randomly spawn whenever they like.

      boolean isGhostReleaseable() 
      void render()
      Loops over all ghosts and draws them.
      void setAllGhostsInvincible()
      Makes all ghosts invincible again, should be called a desired amount of time after activating the warning on the ghosts.

      Makes all ghosts that are loose in the labyrinth killable by Pacman.

      Calculates the spawn timer (default 5 seconds in between spawns)

    • Constructor Detail

      • GhostManager

        public GhostManager(GameplayScene game,
            Pacman pacman,
            Level level,
            int numberOfGhosts)
        Creates a ghost manager that makes sure that ghosts can't randomly spawn whenever they like. Ghosts can only spawn if the super-snack timer is off (this means that the killed ghosts or ghosts that haven't already been released won't come out of the nest before the player is killable again.
        Parameters:
        game -
        pacman -
        level -
        numberOfGhosts -

    • Method Detail

      • cleanUp

        public void cleanUp()
        Loops over all ghosts and calls their cleanUp methods.
        Specified by:
        cleanUp in class Manager

      • update

        public void update(float delta)
        Calculates the spawn timer (default 5 seconds in between spawns)
        Specified by:
        update in class Manager
        Parameters:
        delta -

      • render

        public void render()
        Loops over all ghosts and draws them.
        Specified by:
        render in class Manager

      • setAllGhostsInvincible

        public void setAllGhostsInvincible()
        Makes all ghosts invincible again, should be called a desired amount of time after activating the warning on the ghosts.

      • setGhostReleaseable

        public void setGhostReleaseable(boolean ghostReleaseable)
        Makes the ghosts able to get out from the nest. If Pacman is invincible no ghosts will be released (he can still kill all the ones in the maze).
        Parameters:
        ghostReleaseable -

      • setAllGhostsKillable

        public void setAllGhostsKillable()
        Makes all ghosts that are loose in the labyrinth killable by Pacman. This method should only be called from GameplayScene, which is triggered by the SnackManager class, when Pacman eats a SuperSnack.

      • setWarningOnGhosts

        public void setWarningOnGhosts()
        Activates the blinking effect on the ghosts, short before they get invincible again.

      • getGhosts

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Ghost> getGhosts()
        Returns:

      • isGhostReleaseable

        public boolean isGhostReleaseable()
        Returns:
